name: 白文章
objective:
介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。

Database Management has emerged as one of the important applications of software 
Technology in the information systems. 
This course is designed to provide the basic concepts of database, database management systems, Data warehouse, Big Data and applications of database management systems. 
Students are able to understand and development the applications of database management systems by this course.
schedule:
10/20 EER, Cardinality, Case Study
10/27 Ch.4 Mapping to ER Table / An Access system
11/3 Ch.4 Normalization
11/10 Ch. 5 Physical Design
11/17 Mid-term Examination
11/24 Ch.11 Big Data
12/1  Ch.6 SQL
12/8 Office Access and SQL
12/15 ~ 12/29 Access System Development
1/5 System Build
1/12 System Test
scorePolicy:
出席  10%

平時作業  30%

期中考  30%

期末系統建置  30%
materials:
1.J. Hoffer, R. Venkataraman, H. Topi, Modern Batabase Management, 12th edtion, 開發圖書 代理

2.江高舉，跟我學 Access 2013，基峰
